resources.string:
The challenge is to write a story with the generated prompts.

 The prompts are generated randomly, and thus may conflict; whether you take them literally or adapt them to make it make sense is up to you. 

The relevance of each prompt and how much you use it in the story is up to you.
Please, choose at least one prompt
Las consignas se pueden generar de forma fantasiosa y combinarse de forma aleatoria, o pueden ser m√°s realistas y mantener cierta consistencia temporal
Historic Setting: the timeline in which the story is set
Location: a physical space, like a country, region or building
Character: A trait of a character of the story, who may or may not be the protagonist
Event: An action or incident that\'s part of the plot
Objet: a physical object that somehow appears in the story
